name: DrillTillDeep
description:
DrillTillDeep is a two dimensional game in which players collect crystals under the soil by digging the crystals. It's a survival game where you've got to prevent yourself from colliding with the other miners.

You can use crystals to get special powers. Beware of the Boss Miner!

Art/Programming: @itsabiral

UI UX/Programming: @prerak

Programming: @binaya
